title: Chad Peterson from Strife
itunes:title: Chad Peterson from Strife
description:
In my very first late night recording, Chad and I caught up at his work after a show. I gushed to him about how important Strife is to me musically and he spoke to me about his unusual upbringing, selling out and keeping his faith in music. A very open and honest chat that I was glad to have, even if we were both pretty tired. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
